reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater well-made and stylish, with a flattering fit that's not oversized. They appreciate its comfort, noting it's not itchy, and describe it as soft and offering good warmth for winter. The color quality receives positive feedback, with one customer specifically mentioning the combination of white and white with stripes, while another notes it's perfect for cool spring mornings.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality!
items.body: Even I'm surprised at the quality of the sweater for the great price. As in most tops that I have ordered the sleeves are too long. But it's great in color, fit, style and so soft. I sized up for roomy fit. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, Bright and Comfy
items.body: This is a really cute sweater. It is well made and the seems are sewn well. The color that I ordered is the hot pink and it is bright and as pictured. The seater is mid-weight and a nice thickness and fits true to size. It is not very oversized so if you want a looser look size up. My normal size is small or extra small and this fit true to size. This sweater is really comfortable and it’s slightly loose shape will look great with jeans and a French tuck or leggings. I haven’t washed it yet so I don’t know about shrinkage. This sweater is cute, different and comfy and I recommend! Read more
items.author: sailfishes

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cozy warm sweater.
items.body: I like the look of this sweater. It's sporty but also classy looking. It's sort of lined like a sweat shirt so nice and warm. I'm not sure about washing? I have washed once but just not sure about color if the white seems a little less white because of the black. But still I like the concept and wear it. Read more
items.author: Karen Brady

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater!
items.body: Love this sweater! Soft, comfortable and great color. Fits nicely. Read more
items.author: Heidi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality material and construction
items.body: Good quality and well made sweater ASI removed it from packaging I thought it would be too big but after washing it fit fine. It’s a very warm and thicker than expected. I like it. Good fit. Not at all disappointed. Read more
items.author: Lisababe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish sweater
items.body: Washes well - no pilling - laid flat to dry. No shrinkage and just tossed in dryer for a few minutes. It’s moderately thick and soft could be worn fall into winter or early spring. True to size Would buy again!! Read more
items.author: Rebecca Pifer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice and good fit
items.body: Nice fit and pattern. Warm but not too warm. Read more
items.author: Coral Hughbanks

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Don't order the red.
items.body: I really liked this sweater. I ordered the red and white. But when I washed it in cold water the red faded on the white causing the white color turn to pink. Not pretty anymore. Read more
items.author: genie

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Khaki, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Camel, Coffee, Dark Gray, Orange, Rose Red, Deep Blue, Green Snow Flakes, Grey, Gary Pink, Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
